name: SurvivalZ (itch)
description:
This game was created within a weekend, inspired by COD: nazi zombies, but was originally only singleplayer. The purpose of this game project was to learn about Unity's Mirror framework by making this game support multiplayer in the prosess.

Player count: 1-4

Game mission:

You have arrived at an abandoned cottage in the woods, escaping the chasing zombies, but not for long. Prepare yourself to outlast the horde!

1. Try to survive for as long as possible
2. Shoot zombies and repair barricades to gather points
3. Find the chest to upgrade weapon or spend points to place turrets

Controls:
Move: ASDW
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left mouse click
Dodge: Right mouse click
Interact / place: E
Toggle turret mode: Q
Repair Barricade: hold F
ScoreScreen: TAB
Open/close menu: ESC

Some of known issues: 
- Built in Shadow casting was broke in used version of Unity. Waiting for update.
- Audio may be glitchy at times in multiplayer session

NB! Port forwarding is required for online session. Port: 7777
